ygData.subject: Re: Questions about ROTLC
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Answers: 1) Qwinn is pretty common.  Just do a /ooc and have others help locate him.  He roams all over the zone so someone with tracking is helpful. You
ygData.messageBody:
> Now for the questions...
> 1. How rare is Qwinn ? it took me about 16 hours to get Br Z. more rare
> ? less rare ? good places to try and find him / spot him ? does he have
> placeholders ? basically anyone got any low down on him ?
> 2. Is there still a skill check against tailoring ? (I have 0 skill in
> tailoring or maybe 1)
> if there is, and it fails will a GM give me either all the items again
> or the robe ?
> and should I petition a GM before attempting ... just in case ?
> (I heard that this was fixed a few patches back but still I want to be
> sure, this is hundreds of hours worth of work, I don't want to lose it)

> yay the ordeal is almost over ..... treant fists next 8(.

Answers:
1) Qwinn is pretty common. Just do a /ooc and have others help locate
him. He roams all over the zone so someone with tracking is helpful.
You do not need to kill him, and as another person pointed out, he hits
extremely hard. Watched him taked out a cyclops in 2 rounds...
2) No skill check is needed for making the robe now.

Treant fist.. Enjoy the boring camp of the Gorge... 3 of 4 pieces are
easy to get, the gorge one sucked up hours and hours of time.

Naktor
Solusek Ro
